xml:
That's me trying to explain my research to my dog. As I found out, communicating research (and why it is useful) is difficult.
I built this web app to make some interesting results from my PhD research accessible beyond the scientific papers.
I hope you like it! If you have any questions or something does (not) work for you, get in touch or leave a message ! :)
Cheers,
Koen
About the author Koen Berends is a PhD candidate at the University of Twente and a researcher at Deltares.
